confront_cartel_leaders.title: Cartel Board Meeting
confront_cartel_leaders.description: You stride into the Prism Galleria's highest tower, where Cartel executives sit around a crystal table. Director Vale looks up coolly: 'So the independent traders sent you to threaten us? We're simply practicing efficient market operations. If they can't compete, perhaps they shouldn't be in business.'

choices.text: 'I have evidence of illegal price manipulation.'
'What would it take to stop this predatory pricing?'
'I should gather more evidence before escalating.'
